name: Fortune Simulator
description:
A game may depend on luck rather than skill or effort, so if you don't like hard games which require top level skill then this is the perfect game for you!

"Leaving it to chance" is a way of resolving issues, just like flipping the coin, you can use this game to determine your luck!

- Luck can be good or bad
- Luck applies to a sentient being
- Luck can be accident or chance

So do you believe in luck?))

Good luck and have fun!
